name: Designs on figma
about:
I performed these works on a free course from the yudaev.school/branding team.
If you want to see exactly my skills in design, you can give me a test task and I will gladly complete it to demonstrate my skills.

name: Landing page for IDET
about:
This is a landing page for the company «IDET».
Website was built on Angular 14 and utilises ngx-translate, swiperjs, Bootstrap grid. The website is adapted for different devices.

name: Widgets demonstration
about:
Interactive information system for the dispatch centre.
Website was built on Angular 14. The website is adapted for different devices.
